title: Who does still listen to Chester Bennington in 2018? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is the same type of question as “Who listens to Linkin Park in 2018?” ..which I have also already answered. Have you no orginal thoughts..? Is life so intimidating that you cannot ask your peers this simple question? Do you feel like it would be weird or something? Just cuz Chester has passed it doesn't mean LP's music should be put up on a shelf to collect some dust bunnies. Listening to his music keeps him alive in your memories today. Music is timeless.

What are you searching for exactly? Looks like youre a sheep who is looking out for signal from random heards or you just a crowd person waiting to know is chester still famous across your surrounding.
